Class mainApplication

java.lang.Object
com.xml.editor.mainApplication
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class mainApplication extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The mainApplication class handles the functionality of an XML editor application. It provides methods for theme switching, file operations (compression, decompression, import/export), and text formatting and validation. The application allows users to work with XML, JSON, and other file types.

    • updateFeedback

      public void updateFeedback(String message)
      Updates the feedback displayed in the feedbackFlow TextFlow.
      Parameters:
      message - the feedback message to be displayed.

    • toggleTheme

      public void toggleTheme(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Toggles between light and dark themes. This method updates the stylesheets and theme-related images in the UI.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the theme toggle button.

    • decompressFile

      public void decompressFile(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Decompresses the content in the input area and displays it in the output area. It uses a helper method to perform the decompression.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the "Decompress" button.

    • compressFile

      public void compressFile(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Compresses the content in the input area and displays it in the output area. It uses a helper method to perform the compression.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the "Compress" button.

    • convertToJson

      public void convertToJson(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Converts XML content in the input area to JSON format and displays the result in the output area.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the "Convert to JSON" button.

    • minifyFile

      public void minifyFile(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Minifies the content in the input area and displays it in the output area.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the "Minify" button.

    • formatFile

      public void formatFile(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Formats the content in the input area and displays it in the output area.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the "Format" button.

    • repairFile

      public void repairFile(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Repairs the content in the input area by checking for errors and correcting them if necessary.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the "Repair" button.

    • validateFile

      public void validateFile(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Validates the XML file in the input area and shows whether it is valid or contains errors.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the "Validate" button.

    • importFile

      public void importFile(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Imports a file into the input area. Allows the user to choose a file using a file chooser dialog.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the "Import File" button.

    • saveFile

      public void saveFile(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Saves the current output area content to the selected file.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - the event triggered by the "Save" button.

    • saveAsFile

      public void saveAsFile(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Saves the content from the output area into a file chosen by the user. The user can choose between different file formats such as XML, text, or JSON.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by the user action.

    • createNewFile

      public void createNewFile(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Clears the input and output areas and resets the font size, effectively creating a new file.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by the user action.

    • zoomIn

      public void zoomIn(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Increases the font size for the input and output areas.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by the user action.

    • zoomOut

      public void zoomOut(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent)
      Decreases the font size for the input and output areas.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by the user action.

    • setupFileChooser

      public void setupFileChooser()
      Configures the file chooser with different file extension filters, allowing the user to choose from various file types.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes the editor by setting up the text areas, scroll bars, and line number display. Also, binds the vertical scroll values for synchronization between input/output areas.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location of the FXML file.
      resourceBundle - The resource bundle for localization.

    • search_but

      public void search_but(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Opens a search window where the user can search for content within the input area.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by the user action.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while loading the search window.

    • graph_but

      public void graph_but(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Opens a new window to display a graph based on the content in the input area. Allows the user to save the generated graph.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by the user action.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while creating the graph.

    • network_but

      public void network_but(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws IOException
      Opens a network analysis window where the user can analyze the content of the input area.
      Parameters:
      actionEvent - The event triggered by the user action.
      Throws:
      IOException - If an error occurs while loading the network analysis window.
